name: Fruit Line Game -Crush Mania
description:
Fruit Line Game -Crush Mania is an addictive, fast-paced fruit matching game that promises to entertain for hours.It's amazing.
Clear three or more same fruits to score points.
Features:
- The game contains more than 60 levels.
- Good sound,Great graphic and cool animation effects.

How to play:
1.Connect three or more same fruits to score points,the points depends on number of fruits. If only have two fruits will decrease points.
2.Archive the target points to level up.
3.Play the game and Have Fun!!!
